column1: Cameroon have pulled off a stunning victory over Brazil
column2: but it ultimately proves to be in vain. Vincent Aboubakar's late header sent the crowd into a frenzy
column3: as Cameroon snatched a win in a match that Brazil had largely been in control of. The Selecao had plenty of chances to score
column4: but their finishing let them down
column5: and Brazil couldn't end their group stage campaign with a win. Despite Switzerland's 3-2 win over Serbia
column6: Brazil will still finish top of Group G
column7: but this result means that Cameroon's World Cup journey is over
column8: as they needed the Swiss to draw or lose in order to progress.
